tables.table_schema:
'CREATE TABLE ar_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    ar_event TEXT
);'

'CREATE TABLE error_reporting (
    error_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    error_message TEXT
);'

CREATE TABLE ar_experience_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE error_reporting_data (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT NOT NULL,
    error_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    error_message TEXT,
    error_code INT
);

CREATE TABLE optimization_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    optimization_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ARExperienceLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  ar_session_id INT,
  ar_experience_name VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ErrorReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_id INT,
  error_code INT,
  error_message TEXT,
  reported_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ar_experience_logs(
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    ar_content_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    ar_interaction TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE error_reporting_data(
    error_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id UUID,
    error_message TEXT,
    error_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    error_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE troubleshooting_data(
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id UUID,
    report_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    reported_by TEXT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE optimization_data(
    optimization_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id UUID,
    optimization_type TEXT,
    optimization_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    optimization_details TEXT
);
